name: Hurricane Arvo - Remastered
description:
The hit 2018 WolverineSoft gamejam game made in MATLAB makes its smashing debut in UNITY with:

HURRICANE ARVO - REMASTERED

Play as a hurricane that develops more and more mass with each roman village it destroys. Can you destroy enough villages to grow large enough to conquer the planet?? 

Note: UI is fuckywucky, pls make do. Alt + f4 to quit btw
